snippet.title: Evertried - Release Date Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Ascend a mysterious tower in the afterlife using your wits, strategy and positioning in turn-based combat. Make clever use of attacks, movement, skills and hazards to clear floors of enemies and advance higher toward your destiny in Evertried, a tactical rogue-lite. Coming to Nintendo Switch™ on October 21st.

#Evertried #NintendoSwitch 

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
